xmlText.p: TEXAS RANGERS — Agreed to terms with RHP Bartolo Colon on a minor league contract.<
PITTSBURGH PIRATES — Agreed to terms with LHP Estalin Ortiz on a minor league contract.<
ATLANTA HAWKS — Recalled F Tyler Cavanaugh from Erie (NBAGL).
ANAHEIM DUCKS — Recalled F Mitch Hults from Utah (ECHL) to San Diego (AHL).
ARIZONA CARDINALS — Assigned G Adin Hill to Tucson (AHL)>
EDMONTON OILERS — Assigned G Shane Starrett from Bakersfield (AHL) to Wichita (ECHL).
NEW JERSEY DEVILS — Assigned G Ken Appleby to Binghamton (AHL). Recalled G Eddie Lack from Binghamton.
NEW YORK RANGERS — Recalled F Vinni Lettieri from Hartford (AHL).<
BELLEVILLE SENATORS — Recalled F Daniel Ciampini from Brampton (ECHL).<
ORLANDO SOLAR BEARS — Released D Brandon Pfeil.
UTAH GRIZZLIES — Signed F Nate Mitton.
WHEELING NAILERS — Signed F Tyler Murovich.
WICHITA THUNDER — Released G Mike Ozowski as emergency backup.
